Name: Kee-Wee Martini
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0Â°Brix)
Instructions: Cut kiwi fruit in half, scoop out flesh into base of shaker and MUDDLE. Add other ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass.
Review: The citrus hints in the kiwi combine brilliantly with those in the gin and fresh lemon juice.
History: My version of this ubiquitous drink. Our Martini cocktail page details its evolution and other common variants.
